question: Which drugs are included in the EE-4A regimen for Wilm's tumor?
ideal_answer: EE-4A regimen includes dactinomycin and vincristine.

snippets.text: Five patients received treatment regimen EE-4A, dactinomycin, and vincristine.
One month following the resection, chemotherapy with vincristine plus dactinomycin (EE-4A regimen) was commenced.
